name: Deater Foundation
description: The Deater Foundation provides emergency financial support, educational resources, and compassionate assistance to families navigating unexpected challenges.
mission: To honor the Deater family legacy by helping vulnerable families access the resources, financial assistance, and encouragement they need to thrive.
values: Equity and dignity for every family

donate.mailing: Checks can be mailed to Deater Foundation, PO Box 123, Harrisburg, PA 17101
